description: Whether you spend your time on the water, in the water, or near the water, this super light, extra minimal men's sandal has you covered. Razor siping on the soles is extra grippy on slick surfaces—we see you wet boulders—and the quick-dry webbing is perfect for going from lakeside to campside.
name: Keen Clearwater CNX - Mens

specs.value: EVA insole with arch support for all-day comfort
High-rebound PU midsole offers resilient cushioning
Eco Anti-Odor for natural odor control
Most customers find this style is true to size
